verbs.description: If [ARG0: you] [V: think] [ARG1: of the current hysteria] [ARG2: as a kind of Donald Trump cult effect] , everything suddenly makes sense .
[ARGM-ADV: If you think of the current hysteria as a kind of Donald Trump cult effect] , [ARG0: everything] [ARGM-ADV: suddenly] [V: makes] [ARG1: sense] .
